SELECT bd_no, bd_title, DATE_FORMAT(bd_cre_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as bd_cre_date, bd_writer, bd_count, fixtop
FROM board WHERE 1=1
AND bd_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND bd_contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND( bd_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') or bd_contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') )
ORDER BY fixtop DESC, bd_no DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT count(bd_no)
FROM board WHERE fixtop = "0"
AND bd_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND bd_contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%')
AND( bd_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') or bd_contents LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWrd} ,'%') )
